abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ { "or" : [ "DatasetKey is Great Backyard Bird Count", "DatasetKey is iNaturalist Research-grade Observations", "DatasetKey is WFVZ Bird Collections", "DatasetKey is NMNH Extant Specimen Records", "DatasetKey is AMNH Bird Collection", "DatasetKey is Atlas de las Aves de México: Fase II", "DatasetKey is Xeno-canto - Bird sounds from around the world", "DatasetKey is MVZ Bird Collection (Arctos)", "DatasetKey is University of Michigan Museum of Zoology, Division of Birds", "DatasetKey is Point Reyes Bird Observatory - Point Counts", "DatasetKey is Riqueza específica, distribución y abundancia de aves terrestres y marinas en Isla San José, Golfo de California, Baja California Sur, México", "DatasetKey is NatureServe Network Species Occurrence Data", "DatasetKey is Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University" ] }, { "or" : [ "TaxonKey is Polioptila melanura Lawrence, 1857", "TaxonKey is Toxostoma crissale Henry, 1858", "TaxonKey is Vireo bellii Audubon, 1844", "TaxonKey is Auriparus flaviceps (Sundevall, 1850)" ] } ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 416 records from University of Michigan Museum of Zoology, Division of Birds 494 records from Xeno-canto - Bird sounds from around the world 551 records from AMNH Bird Collection 612 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 746 records from MVZ Bird Collection (Arctos) 839 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records 921 records from NatureServe Network Species Occurrence Data 947 records from Riqueza específica, distribución y abundancia de aves terrestres y marinas en Isla San José, Golfo de California, Baja California Sur, México 1188 records from WFVZ Bird Collections 1561 records from Atlas de las Aves de México: Fase II 1667 records from Point Reyes Bird Observatory - Point Counts 3194 records from Great Backyard Bird Count 3501 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
